name: Timeless (itch) (Dacrow88)
description:
You're trap in a dungeon frozen in time, but you have the skill to let it flow!

This game  was developed for the // TODO game jam #2 under the thematic "There is no time to loose":

- The world is paused, so there is no time to loose.

- You have the skill to unpause the world, but you have only 3 seconds of time to use, do it wisely.

- Levels designed to pressure with time in a paused world.

Note: use gamepad for better experience.
